website_summaries.verdict: This mid-cut hiking boot from Hoka One One received praises for its lightweight design and comfortable feel. It’s also appreciated by hikers with plantar fasciitis for reducing heel pain. On the other hand, the reported questionable quality might be a cause of concern. In conclusion, the Hoka One One Tor Tech Mid Waterproof delivers a fair amount of benefits to outdoor enthusiasts.
pros: A decent number of hikers with plantar fasciitis said that with the Hoka One One Tor Tech Mid Waterproof, they experienced lesser foot pain
A huge percentage of buyers raved about how comfortable the boot was
The majority were delighted with its lightness
The hiking boot afforded sufficient ankle support, as reported by some owners
Several Hoka One One consumers were satisfied with the effective performance of its waterproof membrane
The grippy outsole of this day hiking boot received positive remarks from a significant number of wearers
Its zero break-in period delighted most consumers
Many users indicated that the Tor Tech Mid Waterproof from Hoka One One offered a well-cushioned interior
cons: One wearer commented that the Hoka One One Tor Tech Mid Waterproof isn’t breathable, causing sweaty feet during hikes
A couple of users were let down because of the boot’s subpar quality
A few owners were not happy when this Hoka hiking boot showed signs of wear quickly

customer_reviews.title: The quality was not up to HOKA standards.
customer_reviews.text: I have HOKA low shoes and the quality of the high ones was missing. The seams near the tongue were raw and unfinished. I think these were SECONDS, being sold for a price of premium quality. These would not pass inspection or were merely overlooked. The overall structure was not supportive, a sprained ankle waiting to happen!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Drever

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. A little on the larger end of size. I normally wear an 11 but I wear a 10.5 in these. I walk dogs in them (5-10 miles a day) and they have held up better than most shoes I’ve worn.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: These are incredibly light but still provide the stability needed for a mountain hike.
customer_reviews.text: We hike a lot! I normally wear my 3/4 shank Scarpa boots, but wanted a lighter option. These fit the bill. While these are more smearing than edging, I love these boots for mountain climbing as long as I don’t need a technical boot. I just did an 8 hour mountain hike in the Southeast Alaska temperate rainforest, and these were absolutely awesome. I ordered another pair as I do not believe Hoka is still making these. A real shame!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Belec

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The description on Amazon website indicated the product as men’s shoes but women’s shoes were delivered instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I've bought boots for wife, she wears 6.5 and it fit comfortable. She stepped into brook and boots stood dry and warm. Excellent for hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Maksim Klimenko

customer_reviews.title: ᔕᗩTIᔕᖴIᗴᗪ
customer_reviews.text: ᕼOKᗩᔕ ᗩᖇᗴ ᗩ ᘜᖇᗴᗩT ᔕᕼOᗴ ᑭᗴᖇIOᗪ. I ᗯᗩᔕ ᐯᗴᖇY ᑭᒪᗴᗩᔕᗴᗪ ᗯITᕼ TᕼIᔕ ᑭᑌᖇᑕᕼᗩᔕᗴ. TᕼᗴY ᗩᖇᗴ Tᑌᖇᗴ TO ᔕIᘔᗴ.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sauce!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these hiking boots! Hoka is the bomb!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M Lima

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at a local hiking store and have no complaints. I wore them for almost two weeks while hiking in the Grand Tetons and Yellowstone. Really didn’t need to break them in, they were comfortable from day one.
customer_reviews.author: J Grace

customer_reviews.title: NOT waterproof. It’s water-resistant
customer_reviews.text: Used this shoes for hiking the Camino. I like everything about it. The only downside is it’s not waterproof. It’s water resistant. My feet got wet when it rained during our hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: Great Hiking Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these hiking shoes! They're lightweight, super comfy, and have excellent traction. I recently hiked a bunch of slick rock trails with a lot of scrambling/climbing. And these shoes did great on the slick rock! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Next Destination Unknown

product_meta.title: HOKA ONE ONE Women's Tor Tech Mid Waterproof Hiking Shoe
product_meta.description: The Tor Tech Mid Waterproof Hiking Shoe combines a durable textile upper with the dynamic RMAT midsole for lightweight responsiveness. The waterproof upper with eVent membranes has a gusseted tongue keeps your feet dry and debris out when the trail gets messy. Hoka One One's RMAT is utilized in the Dynamic Midfoot Transition Zone for a smooth and soft transition Multi-directional sticky rubber lugs offer supreme traction on uneven surfaces. Features Breathable upper with waterproof eVent membranes Gusseted tongue keeps debris out Soft ankle collar for comfortable support Engineered RMAT midsole Multi-directional sticky rubber lugs.
feature_bullets: Features of this item include: Hiking, Lug Sole, Outdoor, Waterproof
